name: insightsheet-mobile
description: InsightSheet Mobile - Native iOS and Android App
author: Meldra

scripts.sync: npm run build:web && npx cap sync
scripts.sync:ios: npm run build:web && npx cap sync ios
scripts.sync:android: npm run build:web && npx cap sync android
scripts.run:ios: npm run sync:ios && npx cap run ios
scripts.run:android: npm run sync:android && npx cap run android
scripts.build:ios: npm run sync:ios && cd ios/App && xcodebuild -workspace App.xcworkspace -scheme App -configuration Release
scripts.build:android: npm run sync:android && cd android && ./gradlew assembleRelease
